spell_list.description: The Exorcist channels their divine magic into pulsing divine damage, hitting up to 4 targets within 7.5 meters of the cleric. The cleric must be hated by at least one target within the 7.5 meter radius for the damage to trigger. While Exorcise is active, the cleric's heals are greatly reduced. This spell can be toggled off.
spell_list.description_pvp: The Exorcist channels their divine magic into pulsing divine damage, hitting up to 4 targets within 7.5 meters of the cleric. The cleric must be hated by at least one target within the 7.5 meter radius for the damage to trigger. While Exorcise is active, the cleric's heals are greatly reduced. This spell can be toggled off.

effect_list.description: Reduces the potency of heals by 95%
Inflicts 11 - 18 divine damage on targets in Area of Effect

spell_list.name: Exorcise
